message: Let's split it evenly, it's fair!
I'll give you a small share, but I'm the one taking the risk of inflation!
You're taking a bigger risk with inflation, I want a bit more!
You're playing hard to get, but I'll give you a slightly better deal
You're getting desperate, I'll take a bigger share!
I'm not getting desperate, I'm just being realistic about the value of money
You're not being realistic, I'm taking control of the negotiations!
I'm not giving up yet, I'll try to salvage what I can
This is my best offer, take it or leave it!
I'm running out of time, but I won't give in completely
This is my final offer, take it or walk away!
I'll take the last crumbs, it's better than nothing!
